description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work spans topics like digital fragmentation, ecosystem architecture, and decentralized innovation. yeehaa's blog posts and curated courses reflect his interdisciplinary approach, exploring concepts from McLuhan's global village to Shenzhen's shanzhai ecosystem. He advocates for practice-based innovation, value pluralism, and breaking down silos to create thriving, interconnected communities.
blurb: yeehaa: Ecosystem architect, philosopher, and tech innovator fostering inclusive digital landscapes and transformative education through interdisciplinary approaches and community-driven initiatives.
